description.p: Choose a magical bonus of +1 to +3. This sword gains that bonus to its attack and damage rolls. For each point of bonus you choose for the sword, you take a corresponding penalty (−1 to −3) to your death saving throws. You can change this magical bonus each day at dawn.
Curse.This weapon is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with a Remove Curse spell or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the weapon.
the blade can be leveled up:

ul.li: +1 - You cam use the blade to cast darkness. You regain the ability to do so after a short or long rest.
+2 - In addition to +1, you gain darkvision out to 120ft and the ability to see in magical darkness.
+3 - in addition to +1 and +2, you can grant another creature of your choice within 30ft the benefits of +2.

description.p: Satin gloves with Mithral strands weaved in.
